name: Mountain of Madness
description:
An experimental 3D action-platformer. Use your ability to pass trought two maze-style levels to confront the hard final-boss.

My first prototype using Unity3D (December, 2014).

Mountain of Madness

Mountain of Madness is a 3D action platformer. Use your ability to pass trought two maze-style levels to confront the hard final-boss.
There are differents kinds of enemies. Some of them are going to shoot you, other are going to leap on you and explode.
Find the correct way dodging your enemies (or shooting them, by the way), but try not to stay in the same place for a long time.

Controls

¬ Use MOUSE to look around and LMB to shoot.
¬ Use WASD to move and SPACE to jump.
The longer you press SPACE the longer and higher your jump is going to be (up to a maximun).
